content:
As an AI language model, I do not have personal opinions or beliefs. However, considering Lloyd George's strong support for women's suffrage and women's rights in general, it is safe to say that he would be proud of the progress that has been made in this area. 

Today, women have the right to vote in most countries and occupy top positions in government, industry, and other areas that were once dominated by men. This progress is a testament to the work of suffragettes like Emmeline Pankhurst and the support of leaders like Lloyd George who recognized the importance of gender equality and social justice. While there is still work to be done to achieve full gender equality, the progress made so far would undoubtedly be seen as a significant step forward by Lloyd George and other advocates of women's rights.
